Annotation Interface HeaderField

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface HeaderField
Annotation to customize the display of fields in the PaginationTableScreen. This annotation is applied to fields to control their visibility, display name, width, and rendering behavior through a custom renderer FieldRenderer.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    name
    Specifies a custom name for the annotated field.
    Class<? extends FieldRenderer>
    renderer
    Specifies a custom renderer class for the annotated field.
    boolean
    show
    Control whether the field should be displayed
    int
    verticalWidth
    Specifies the width of the column in the vertical table for the annotated field.
    int
    width
    Specifies the width of the column in the table for the annotated field.

  • Element Details

    • show

      boolean show
      Control whether the field should be displayed
      Returns:
      true if the value is to be displayed, false otherwise
      Default:
      true

    • name

      String name
      Specifies a custom name for the annotated field. If not provided, the default name will be derived from the field's name.
      Returns:
      the custom name for the field as a string
      Default:
      ""

    • width

      int width
      Specifies the width of the column in the table for the annotated field. If not provided, the default width is 20.
      Returns:
      the width of the field as an integer
      Default:
      20

    • verticalWidth

      int verticalWidth
      Specifies the width of the column in the vertical table for the annotated field. Used by PrintTableUtils.printItemAsVerticalTable(ConsoleInterface, Object) If not provided, the default width is 20.
      Returns:
      the width of the field as an integer
      Default:
      20

    • renderer

      Class<? extends FieldRenderer> renderer
      Specifies a custom renderer class for the annotated field. The custom renderer class must extend from FieldRenderer.
      Returns:
      the class of the custom field renderer
      Default:
      com.group6.hms.framework.screens.pagination.StringRenderer.class
